subject: Re: [junit] Recover from test hangs
msgSnippet: Actually, I meant the manager of the thread will kill the spawned thread whence the manager noticed the timeLimit for the run is up. Thanks for reply. Thach
messageBody:
Actually, I meant the manager of the thread will kill the spawned thread
whence the manager noticed the timeLimit for the run is up.

Thanks for reply.
Thach Nguyen
